input.sentences: we went by a local pond to feed the ducks today .
we saw many different kinds of ducks .
the seagulls were trying to eat all the food .
we saw a weirdly shaped sea creature also .
output.sentences: Our visit to the local pond had us feeding these ducks.
There were different kinds of ducks.
The seagulls decided that they wanted to eat food as well.
This sea was definitely weirdly shaped.
